email_body:
Booking Approved!

Dear {agent_name},

Congratulations! A new booking has been approved:

  • Client: {client_name}
  • Salesman: {salesman_name}
  • Date: {appointment_date}
  • Time: {appointment_time}

Great work on securing this appointment!

Best regards,
{company_name}
sms_body: Congrats {agent_name}! Booking approved for {client_name} with {salesman_name} on {appointment_date} at {appointment_time}. - {company_name}

email_body:
Appointment Confirmed!

Dear {client_name},

Your appointment with {salesman_name} has been confirmed for:

  • Date: {appointment_date}
  • Time: {appointment_time}

If you need to reschedule, please reply to this email or contact us directly.

We look forward to meeting with you!

Best regards,
{company_name}
sms_body: Hi {client_name}! Your appointment with {salesman_name} is confirmed for {appointment_date} at {appointment_time}. Reply to reschedule. - {company_name}

email_body:
New Appointment!

Dear {salesman_name},

You have a new appointment scheduled:

  • Client: {client_name}
  • Date: {appointment_date}
  • Time: {appointment_time}

Visit the RAU calendar for more details and preparation information.

Best regards,
{company_name}
sms_body: Hi {salesman_name}! You have an appointment with {client_name} on {appointment_date} at {appointment_time}. Check RAU calendar for details. - {company_name}

email_body:
Appointment Reminder

Dear {client_name},

This is a friendly reminder that you have an appointment with {salesman_name} tomorrow:

  • Date: {appointment_date}
  • Time: {appointment_time}

Please arrive on time. If you need to reschedule, reply to this email or contact us as soon as possible.

Best regards,
{company_name}
sms_body: Reminder: You have an appointment with {salesman_name} tomorrow ({appointment_date}) at {appointment_time}. Reply to reschedule. - {company_name}

email_body:
Appointment Reminder

Dear {salesman_name},

Reminder: You have an appointment tomorrow with:

  • Client: {client_name}
  • Date: {appointment_date}
  • Time: {appointment_time}

Please review the client details in the RAU calendar and prepare accordingly.

Best regards,
{company_name}
sms_body: Reminder {salesman_name}: Appointment with {client_name} tomorrow ({appointment_date}) at {appointment_time}. Check RAU calendar. - {company_name}

email_body:
Thank You for Your Visit!

Dear {client_name},

Thank you for meeting with {salesman_name} yesterday. We hope you found our services valuable and informative.

If you have any questions or would like to schedule a follow-up appointment, please reply to this email or contact us directly.

Best regards,
{company_name}
sms_body: Thank you for meeting with {salesman_name} yesterday! We hope you found our services valuable. Reply if you have questions. - {company_name}

email_subject: Following Up on Your Recent Visit
email_body:
How Are Things Going?

Dear {client_name},

It's been a week since your appointment with {salesman_name}. We wanted to follow up and see if you have any questions or if there's anything we can help you with.

We're here to support you every step of the way. Feel free to reply to this email anytime.

Best regards,
{company_name}
sms_body: Hi {client_name}! It's been a week since your visit. Do you have any questions? We're here to help! - {company_name}

email_body:
We'd Love to Hear From You

Dear {client_name},

Two weeks have passed since your appointment with {salesman_name}. We hope everything is going well!

If you'd like to discuss next steps or have any questions, we're just an email away. We'd be happy to schedule another consultation.

Best regards,
{company_name}
sms_body: Hi {client_name}! It's been 2 weeks since your appointment. Need any help or want to discuss next steps? Let us know! - {company_name}

email_subject: 3 Weeks Later - Still Here to Help
email_body:
Still Thinking It Over?

Dear {client_name},

Three weeks ago, you met with {salesman_name}. We understand that important decisions take time.

If you're still considering our services or have additional questions, we'd be happy to assist. Reply to this email to reconnect with us.

Best regards,
{company_name}
sms_body: Hi {client_name}! Still thinking things over? We're happy to answer any questions or schedule a follow-up. - {company_name}

email_body:
We Missed You!

Dear {client_name},

We noticed you weren't able to make your appointment with {salesman_name} yesterday. We understand that schedules can change and things come up.

We'd love to reschedule at your convenience. Simply reply to this email with your preferred date and time.

Best regards,
{company_name}
sms_body: We missed you at your appointment with {salesman_name} yesterday. No worries! Reply to reschedule at your convenience. - {company_name}

email_body:
Let's Reconnect

Dear {client_name},

It's been a week since your scheduled appointment. We wanted to reach out and see if you're still interested in meeting with us.

If you'd like to reschedule, just reply to this email. We're flexible and happy to work around your schedule.

Best regards,
{company_name}
sms_body: Hi {client_name}! Still interested in meeting? Reply to this message and we'll find a time that works for you. - {company_name}

email_body:
We're Still Here

Dear {client_name},

It's been about a month since we last connected. We wanted to reach out one more time to see if you'd like to reschedule your appointment.

If now isn't the right time, we completely understand. Just reply to this email if you'd like to reconnect in the future.

Best regards,
{company_name}
sms_body: Hi {client_name}! It's been a month. Still interested in scheduling? Reply anytime - we're here when you're ready. - {company_name}

email_body:
Long Time No See

Dear {client_name},

Two months have passed, and we wanted to check in. Your needs may have changed, or perhaps now is a better time to connect.

If you'd like to explore our services, we'd be happy to schedule a convenient time to meet. Just reply to this email.

Best regards,
{company_name}
sms_body: Hi {client_name}! It's been 2 months. Things change - if you'd like to reconnect, just reply! - {company_name}

email_subject: Final Check-In - We're Here When You Need Us
email_body:
One Last Hello

Dear {client_name},

It's been three months since we last connected. This will be our final check-in, but we want you to know that our door is always open.

If you ever need our services in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. We'd be happy to help.

Wishing you all the best,
{company_name}
sms_body: Hi {client_name}! It's been 3 months. This is our last check-in, but we're always here if you need us. Best wishes! - {company_name}
